name: Simple Noun Phrase (Det + Noun)
description: A determiner followed by a singular noun.

name: Simple Noun Phrase (Det + Plural Noun)
description: A determiner followed by a plural noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Det + Adj + Noun)
description: Determiner, adjective, and singular noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Det + Adj + Plural Noun)
description: Determiner, adjective, and plural noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Adj + Noun)
description: Adjective modifying a singular noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Adj + Plural Noun)
description: Adjective modifying a plural noun.

name: Proper Noun (Singular)
description: A single proper noun.

name: Proper Noun Phrase (Multi-word)
description: Two consecutive proper nouns, often forming a single entity name.

name: Proper Noun Phrase (Extended)
description: Three consecutive proper nouns.

name: Noun Phrase with Possessive
description: Noun phrase showing possession (e.g., the cat's toy).

name: Noun Phrase with Proper Noun Possessive
description: Proper noun showing possession (e.g., John's book).

name: Noun Phrase (Noun + Noun - Compound Noun)
description: Two nouns forming a compound noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Noun + Plural Noun - Compound Noun)
description: Singular noun followed by plural, possibly a compound.

name: Noun Phrase (Number + Noun)
description: A cardinal number followed by a plural noun.

name: Noun Phrase (Number + Adj + Noun)
description: Cardinal number, adjective, and plural noun.

name: Verb Phrase (Simple Present - 3rd Person)
description: A verb in 3rd person singular present tense.

name: Verb Phrase (Simple Present - Non-3rd Person)
description: A verb in non-3rd person singular present tense.

name: Verb Phrase (Past Tense)
description: A verb in past tense.

name: Verb Phrase (Present Participle/Gerund)
description: A verb as a gerund or present participle.

name: Verb Phrase (Past Participle)
description: A verb as a past participle.

name: Verb Phrase (Modal + Verb)
description: A modal verb followed by a base form verb.

name: Verb Phrase (Modal + Adverb + Verb)
description: Modal, adverb, then base verb.

name: Verb Phrase (To + Verb - Infinitive)
description: 'to' followed by a base form verb (infinitive).

name: Verb Phrase (Verb + Adverb)
description: Verb (3rd person singular) followed by an adverb.

name: Verb Phrase (Verb + Particle)
description: Verb followed by a particle (phrasal verb).

name: Verb Phrase (Progressive Aspect)
description: Verb 'to be' (3rd person) + present participle (e.g., is running).

name: Verb Phrase (Perfect Aspect)
description: Verb 'to have' (non-3rd person) + past participle (e.g., have eaten).

name: Verb Phrase (Modal + Perfect Aspect)
description: Modal + 'have' + past participle (e.g., should have gone).

name: Verb Phrase (Transitive Verb + NP)
description: Past tense verb followed by a determiner and noun (direct object).

name: Prepositional Phrase (Prep + NP)
description: Preposition followed by a determiner and noun.

name: Prepositional Phrase (Prep + Proper Noun)
description: Preposition followed by a proper noun.

name: Prepositional Phrase (Prep + Pronoun)
description: Preposition followed by a personal pronoun.

name: Adjectival Phrase (Adv + Adj)
description: Adverb modifying an adjective.

name: Adjectival Phrase (Adv + Comparative Adj)
description: Adverb modifying a comparative adjective.

name: Adjectival Phrase (Adv + Superlative Adj)
description: Adverb modifying a superlative adjective.

name: Adjectival Phrase (Comparative Adj + Prep)
description: Comparative adjective followed by a preposition (e.g., 'than').

name: Adverbial Phrase (Adv + Adv)
description: Two adverbs, where the first modifies the second.

name: Clause (Subject-Verb)
description: Proper noun subject and a past tense verb.

name: Clause (Pronoun Subject-Verb)
description: Pronoun subject and a past tense verb.

name: Clause (Subject-Verb-Object)
description: Proper noun subject, verb, and proper noun object.

name: Clause (Subject-Verb-PP)
description: Pronoun subject, verb, and a prepositional phrase.

name: Clause (Subject-Verb-Adverb)
description: Noun phrase subject, verb, and adverb.

name: Question (Modal-Subject-Verb)
description: Modal, pronoun subject, and base verb forming a question.

name: Question (Wh-Verb-Subject)
description: Wh-pronoun, verb 'to be', and pronoun subject.

name: Question (Wh-Modal-Subject-Verb)
description: Wh-adverb, modal, pronoun subject, and base verb.

name: Coordinated Nouns
description: Two nouns coordinated by a conjunction.

name: Coordinated Adjectives
description: Two adjectives coordinated by a conjunction.

name: Coordinated Verbs
description: Two verbs coordinated by a conjunction.

name: List of Nouns
description: A comma-separated list of nouns with a final conjunction.

name: Passive Voice (Simple)
description: Noun, form of 'to be', and past participle (e.g., the cake is eaten).

name: Passive Voice with Agent
description: Passive construction followed by 'by' and an agent.
example_sentence_fragment: The song was sung by Elvis

name: Adjective as Noun (The + Adj)
description: Determiner 'the' followed by a superlative adjective, often referring to a group (e.g., the best).

name: Adverb modifying Verb Phrase
description: Adverb modifying a gerund/present participle.

name: Existential There
description: Starts with 'there' (existential), followed by a form of 'to be' and a noun phrase.
